45 // Structure JointInfo
49 struct JointInfo {
50 
51  public :
52 
53  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
54 
56  RigidBody* body1;
57 
59  RigidBody* body2;
60 
62  JointType type;
63 
66  JointsPositionCorrectionTechnique positionCorrectionTechnique;
67 
69  bool isCollisionEnabled;
70 
72  JointInfo(JointType constraintType)
73  : body1(nullptr), body2(nullptr), type(constraintType),
74  positionCorrectionTechnique(JointsPositionCorrectionTechnique::NON_LINEAR_GAUSS_SEIDEL),
75  isCollisionEnabled(true) {
76 
77  }
78 
80  JointInfo(RigidBody* rigidBody1, RigidBody* rigidBody2, JointType constraintType)
81  : body1(rigidBody1), body2(rigidBody2), type(constraintType),
82  positionCorrectionTechnique(JointsPositionCorrectionTechnique::NON_LINEAR_GAUSS_SEIDEL),
83  isCollisionEnabled(true) {
84  }
85 
87  virtual ~JointInfo() = default;
88 
89 };
90 
91 // Class Joint
95 class Joint {
96 
97  protected :
98 
99  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
100 
102  Entity mEntity;
103 
105  PhysicsWorld& mWorld;
106 
107  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
108 
110  virtual size_t getSizeInBytes() const = 0;
111 
113  void awakeBodies() const;
114 
115  public :
116 
117  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
118 
120  Joint(Entity entity, PhysicsWorld& world);
121 
123  virtual ~Joint() = default;
124 
126  Joint(const Joint& constraint) = delete;
127 
129  Joint& operator=(const Joint& constraint) = delete;
130 
132  RigidBody* getBody1() const;
133 
135  RigidBody* getBody2() const;
136 
138  JointType getType() const;
139 
141  virtual Vector3 getReactionForce(decimal timeStep) const=0;
142 
144  virtual Vector3 getReactionTorque(decimal timeStep) const=0;
145 
147  bool isCollisionEnabled() const;
148 
150  Entity getEntity() const;
151 
153  virtual std::string to_string() const=0;
154 
155  // -------------------- Friendship -------------------- //
156 
157  friend class PhysicsWorld;
158  friend class Island;
159  friend class ConstraintSolverSystem;
160 };
161 
162 // Return the entity id of the joint
166 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Entity Joint::getEntity() const {
167  return mEntity;
168 }
169 
170 }
